mapper.select: select p.id,p.userid,u.username,p.projectname,p.projecttype,p.location,p.time,p.money,p.lifeloan,p.ratemoney,p.appendix,p.aduitstate from projectapplication p,usertable u where u.userid=p.userid and p.aduitstate='1'
select p.projectname,o.outday,o.outmoney from outtime o,projectapplication p where o.projrctid=p.id
select f.projectid,p.projectname,f.firststatus,f.firstdate,f.firstname,f.firstremarks from firsttable f,projectapplication p where f.projectid=p.id and f.firststatus='1' and f.finalstatus='1'

select u.username,p.projectname,p.projecttype,p.location,p.time,p.money,p.lifeloan,p.appendix from projectapplication p,firsttable f,usertable u,subjectType s where p.userid=u.userid and p.projecttype=s.id and f.projectid=p.id and f.projectid=#{projectid}

select f.projectid,u.username,p.projectname,s.name,p.location,p.money from finaltable f,projectapplication p,subjecttype s,usertable u where f.projectid=p.id and p.projecttype=s.id and p.userid=u.userid and f.finalstatus='1' and f.poststatus='1'
